main.description: Represents a group of modifiers in a catalog, detailing its ID, the modifiers it contains, images, constraints on selections, and name.

id.description: Unique identifier for the modifier group.

modifiers.description: A list of identifiers for the modifiers within the group.

images.description: List of image URLs for the modifier group.

maximumSelection.description: Maximum number of selections allowed from this modifier group.

minimumSelection.description: Minimum number of selections required from this modifier group.

maximumPerModifier.description: Maximum number of times a single modifier can be selected.
